member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.Background
member.summary: [optional] The background color on which the image will be displayed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.Dpi
member.summary: The DPI setting for the monitor on which the image will be displayed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.Flags
member.summary: The flags indicating which fields of the structure are valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.Format
member.summary: The format of the image (WPF, WinForms, Win32).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.GrayscaleBiasColor
member.summary: [optional] The bias color used to weight a grayscale image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.HighContrast
member.summary: [optional] Determines whether the high-contrast version of the image is requested.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.ImageType
member.summary: The type of the image (bitmap, icon, or image list).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.LogicalHeight
member.summary: The height of the image, in logical units (e.g. the height at 100% DPI).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.LogicalWidth
member.summary: The width of the image, in logical units (e.g. the width at 100% DPI).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes.StructSize
member.summary: The size of the struct.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: The horizontal alignment of the image within the composite image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.ImageMoniker
member.summary: The ImageMoniker rendered in this layer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: The vertical alignment of the image within the composite image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.VirtualHeight
member.summary: The virtual height of this layer. The actual pixel dimensions of the image won't be computed until render time.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.VirtualWidth
member.summary: The virtual width of this layer. The actual pixel dimensions of the image won't be computed until render time.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.VirtualXOffset
member.summary: The virtual X offset of the image. This offset is used together with the HorizontalAlignment to place the image within the composite image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer.VirtualYOffset
member.summary: The virtual Y offset of the image. This offset is used together with the VerticalAlignment to place the image within the composite image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageMoniker.Guid
member.summary: The GUID of the moniker.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageMoniker.Id
member.summary: The ID of the moniker.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.IImageHandle.Moniker
member.summary: Gets the ImageMoniker for this image handle.
member.returns: The ImageMoniker for this image handle.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags
member.summary: Represents an RGBA color with the red channel in the low byte to the alpha channel in the high byte.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Size
member.summary: The LogicalWidth and LogicalHeight fields are valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Type
member.summary: The ImageType field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Format
member.summary: The Format field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Dpi
member.summary: The Dpi field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Background
member.summary: The Background field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_Grayscale
member.summary: The returned image should be grayscaled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_GrayscaleBiasColor
member.summary: The GrayscaleBiasColor field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_HighContrast
member.summary: The HighContrast field is valid.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_RequiredFlags
member.summary: The required flags are: IAF_Size | IAF_Type | IAF_Format | IAF_Dpi.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._ImageAttributesFlags.IAF_OptionalFlags
member.summary: The optional flags are: IAF_Background | IAF_Grayscale | IAF_GrayscaleBiasColor | IAF_HighContrast.

member.summary: Describes the type of the image moniker.

member.summary: The moniker is invalid or stale.

member.summary: The moniker was loaded from a manifest.

member.summary: The moniker was created as a result of a custom image being added.

member.summary: The image is centered horizontally within its container.

member.summary: Describes the type of the image.

member.summary: The image is a bitmap.

member.summary: The image is an icon.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop._UIImageType.IT_ImageList
member.summary: The image is an image list (WinForms, Win32 formats only).

member.summary: The image is top-aligned within its container.

member.summary: Rhe image is centered vertically within its container.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.IImageHandle
member.summary: Represents a handle which keeps a custom image stored in memory. Only keeping the IImageHandle strongly referenced in memory can guarantee that the image associated with the handle's moniker will be kept in memory in the ImageLibrary.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageAttributes
member.summary: Provides image attributes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageCompositionLayer
member.summary: A layer used to compose multiple images into a single merged image.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Imaging.Interop.ImageMoniker
member.summary: Contains the GUID and ID of the image.
